casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
JERRELL R. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 10, 2019

Matthew C. Eagan, assigned counsel, and Emily Graner Sexton, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Brett R. Aiello, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 537, 202 A.3d 1044 (2019), is denied.
